statements: DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
DELETE FROM product_inventory WHERE warehouse_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND current_stock = 0;
DELETE FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM warehouses WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR price > 1000
DELETE FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'California' OR capacity < 100
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 1 AND warehouse_id = 2;
DELETE FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id NOT IN (SELECT warehouse_id FROM restocking_history);
DELETE FROM restocking_history WHERE restock_date < '2022-01-01' AND restock_quantity < 50;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 1 AND warehouse_id = 1;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 3 AND warehouse_id = 4;
